All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminController
The department is the controller of the admin.
ApplicationConfig
The department is responsible for the security of the site.
BeanConfiguration
The class creates some beans with various scopes using QUALIFIERS (method names)
Book
The class represents a book.
BookRepository
The interface contains various functions that query and returns information about the book from the database.

Ex4ApplicationTests
 
MainController
The department is the controller of the store.
Payment
The class represents a payment.
PaymentRepository
The interface contains various functions that query and returns information about the payment from the database.
SessionListenerCounter
A @WebListener class for session counting.
ShoppingCart
This is a bean class instantiated in session.
ShoppingCartService
The class provides service of the shopping cart.
